item.title: Case involving death of man in Raichur will be handed over to CID for investigation, says IGP
item.description:
<![CDATA[Inspector-General of Police (IGP) of Ballari Range B.S. Lokesh Kumar has said that the death of a man in Raichur district after being assaulted by police officers will be handed over to the CID for investigation.
Addressing the media in Raichur on Wednesday, Mr. Lokesh Kumar said that Circle Inspector Nagaraju Meka and Sub-Inspector of Police Manjunath of Raichur West Police Station have been suspended after a case in connection with the death of a 27 year-old man, Veeresh, in Raichur on Tuesda...]]>
item.author: Authors
